name: Universal Truck Simulator Tow Games
description:
Explore the roads of Europe and deliver with Tuck Tow Simulator Europe various broken cars across the continent while driving legendary European trucks! This game takes you on a journey through immersive landscapes and rich environments!
Do you think you have what it takes to be a trucker? Try out your abilities by pushing your skill and performance to the limits! This game features a big open world map, based in Europe! The game includes top graphics and visuals, realistic physics and amazing sound effects! Be a driver of one of the many trucks available, Get behind the wheel and experience the game for yourself!!!
KEY FEATURES:
- Explore the open world map of Europe
- Legendary European trucks!
- Deliever cars from parking point to service!
- High quality graphics and visuals!
- Immersive landscapes!
- Realistic physics and sound design!
